page.title: 11Tourism and recreation.
page.content: For a visitor touring the east coast of Fife they might pass through Lundin Links which has several major amenities such as the L.Links hotel and the Old Manor hotel.There are a few sports facilities such as 2 golf courses,a sports club with squash and tennis courts and bowling green.Nearby is a fine sandy beach with dunes and rocky platforms in places from which sea angling would be possible. as you travel through L.Links you approach L.Largo which is on the coast.Largo is famous for its connections with Robinson Crusoe. There is a Crusoe hotel near a pier and the small harbour. There is a good stretch of sandy beach from which a sailing club operates.Other features worthy of a visit include Largo Law, Upper Largo church and Serpentine footpath.
